title: Former Chelsea star Zola says problems at the club
text:
Former Chelsea star Zola says problems at the club Wednesday, March 07, 2018 - 01:20 
Former Chelsea star Gianfranco Zola says there are clearly problems at the club but dismisses reports he's being considered for a role in the coaching team ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
